3119 /**
3120  * @class BatonObject is a model class which provides a workflow between users for muliple resources. Essentially, it 
3121  * tracks the "holder" of a given resource and provides APIs for grabbing, putting down, 
3122  * and giving control to others. Users with an owner role always have the power to 
3123  * grab the BatonObject, put it down, or give it to others regardless of who has the BatonObject. 
3124  * Users with a publisher role must wait according to the <code>grabbable</code> property:
3125  * <p>
3126  * <ul>
3127  * <li>If the BatonObject is set to <code>grabbable</code>, they may grab the resources in the BatonObject as soon 
3128  * as it is available (since it will then have no controller).</li>
3129  * <li>If the BatonObject is not <code>grabbable</code>, the owner must explicitly pass the resources in the BatonObject
3130  * to someone else. 
3131  * </ul>
3132  * By default, a BatonObject will timeout in five seconds and be released. This timeout can be 
3133  * adjusted in the constructor and extended during use of the resource in question using 
3134  * <code>extendTimer</code>.
3135  * <p>
3136  * Note that users with an owner role may adjust the roles of other users relative to the 
3137  * BatonObject using <code>allowUserToGrab</code> (which makes that user a publisher) and <code>
3138  * allowUserToAdminister</code> (which makes that user an owner).
3139  * </p>
3140  * <p>
3141  * This component also supports "piggybacking" on existing CollectionNodes through its constructor. 
3142  * Developers can avoid CollectionNode proliferation in their applications by pre-supplying a 
3143  * CollectionNode and a <code>nodeName</code> for the BatonObject to use. If none is supplied, the 
3144  * BatonObject will create its own collection node for sending and receiving messages.
3145 
3146  * <table><tr><th><b>Event</b></th><th><b>Summary</b></th></tr>
3147  * <tr><td valign="top"><code>batonHolderChange </code></td> <td> Dispatched when the one of the batonObjects property is assigned,grabbed or when its available.</td></tr>
3148  * <tr><td valign="top"><code>synchronizationChange</code></td> <td> Dispatched when the SharedProperty goes in and out of sync.</td></tr>
3149  * </table> 
3150  * @constructor
3151  */
3152 function BatonObject() {
3153 	this.holderID = new Object();
3154 	this.cachedBatonHolderID = new Object();
3155 	this.autoReleaseTimers = new Object();
3156 	this.sharedID = SharedObject.prototype.sharedID = "_BatonObject";
3157 	this.cachedValueForSetProp = new Object();
3158 	this.cachedValueForDeleteProp = new Object();
3159 	this.connectSession = ConnectSession.primarySession;
3160 }

3230 /**
3231  * Number of seconds after which the BatonObject times out
3232  * If 0, no timeout is used. 
3233  * @param p_timeOut Number of seconds until the resources in the BatonObject is released
3234  * @param p_propertyName The id of the property, If null would set the p_timeOut value to all the properties
3235  * @function
3236  */
3237 BatonObject.prototype.setTimeOut = function(p_timeOut,p_propertyName)
3238 {
3239 	if (p_propertyName) {
3240 		//this.createTimer(p_propertyName);
3241 		if (this.autoReleaseTimers[p_propertyName]) {
3242 			this.autoReleaseTimers[p_propertyName].delay =  p_timeOut*1000;
3243 		} else {
3244 			this.autoReleaseTimers[p_propertyName] = new Object();
3245 			this.autoReleaseTimers[p_propertyName].delay =  p_timeOut*1000;
3246 		}
3247 	} else {
3248 		if (this.autoReleaseTimers) {
3249 			for (var property in this.autoReleaseTimers) {
3250 				this.autoReleaseTimers[p_propertyName].delay =  p_timeOut*1000;
3251 			}
3252 		}
3253 		this.timeOut = p_timeOut;
3254 	}
3255 }
3256 
3257 /**
3258  * Number of seconds after which the BatonObject times out
3259  * @param p_propertyName The id of the property. If null would return the defualt timeout value
3260  * @function
3261  */
3262 BatonObject.prototype.getTimeOut = function(p_propertyName)
3263 {
3264 	if (p_propertyName && this.autoReleaseTimers[p_propertyName].delay) {
3265 		return this.autoReleaseTimers[p_propertyName].delay;
3266 	} else {
3267 		return this.timeOut;
3268 	}
3269 }

3377 /**
3378  * When called by an owner, <code>setUserRole()</code> sets the role of the specified 
3379  * user with respect to this BatonObject. The following rules apply: 
3380  * <ul>
3381  * <li>Setting the role to <code>UserRoles.PUBLISHER</code> allows the user to grab the resources in the BatonObject. </li>
3382  * <li>Setting the role to <code>UserRoles.OWNER</code> allows the user to administer the resources in the BatonObject.</li> 
3383  * <li>Setting to <code>UserRoles.VIEWER</code> will allow neither.</li>
3384  * </ul>
3385  * 
3386  * @param p_userID The <code>userID</code> of the user to set the role for. 
3387  * @param p_role The new role for that user.
3388  * @function
3389  */
3390 BatonObject.prototype.setUserRole = function(p_userID ,p_userRole) 
3391 { 
3392 	if ( p_userID == null ) 
3393 		return ;
3394 	
3395 	
3396 	if ( (p_userRole < 0 || p_userRole > 100) && p_userRole != -999 ) 
3397 		return ; 
3398 	
3399 	this.collectionNode.setUserRole(p_userID, p_userRole, this.batonNodeName);
3400 	var args = new Array();
3401 	args.push(p_userID);
3402 	args.push(p_userRole);
3403 	SharedObject.prototype.setUserRole.apply(this,args) ;
3404 }

3406 /**

3409  * @function
3410  */
3411 BatonObject.prototype.amIHolding = function(p_propertyName)

3414 }

3433 	this.collectionNode = null;

3439 /**
3440  * If grabbable, users with a publisher role can grab the control if it's available 
3441  * by using this method. Users with an owner role may grab a resource in the BatonObject at any time.
3442  * @param p_propertyName The id of the property
3443  * @function
3444  */
3445 BatonObject.prototype.grab = function(p_propertyName) 
3446 { 
3447 	if (!this.canIAdminister()) {
3448 		// if I can Yank, don't worry about other
3449 		if ( !this.isAvailable(p_propertyName) || !this.canIGrab()) {
3450 			return;
3451 		}
3452 	}
3453 	
3454 	if ( this.amIHolding(p_propertyName) ) {
3455 		return;
3456 	}
3457 	
3458 	//this.createTimer(p_propertyName);
3459 	if ( this.isSynchronized ) {
3460 		//grab it
3461 		var msg = new MessageItem();
3462 		msg.nodeName = this.batonNodeName;
3463 		msg.body = this.userManager.myUserID;
3464 		msg.itemID = p_propertyName;
3465 
3466 		this.collectionNode.publishItem(msg);
3467 	} else {
3468 		this.cachedBatonHolderID[p_propertyName] = this.userManager.myUserID;
3469 	}
3470 }
3471 
3472 /**
3473  * Users with an publisher role in control can use this method to 
3474  * release their control. Users with an owner role  can use this method 
3475  * to remove the BatonObject resource from a user who has it.
3476  * @param p_propertyName The id of the property
3477  * @function
3478  */
3479 BatonObject.prototype.putDown = function(p_propertyName) 
3480 {
3481 	//REVISIT
3482 	if ( this.isAvailable(p_propertyName) ) {
3483 		return;
3484 	}
3485 	
3486 	if (!this.canIAdminister() && !this.amIHolding(p_propertyName)) {
3487 		return;
3488 	}			
3489 	if ( this.isSynchronized ) {				
3490 		//release it
3491 		this.collectionNode.retractItem(this.batonNodeName,p_propertyName);
3492 	} // else not in sync, doing nothing
3493 }
3494 
3495 /**
3496  * If the BatonObject is grabbable, the holding user can hand the BatonObject's resource to a specified user. 
3497  * A user with an owner role can give a BatonObject resource to anyone with the required permissions 
3498  * at any time.
3499  * 
3500  * @param p_userID  The <code>userID</code> of the user to allow to grab the BatonObject.
3501  * @param p_propertyName The id of the property   
3502  * @function
3503  */
3504 BatonObject.prototype.giveTo = function(p_userID,p_propertyName) 
3505 { 
3506 	if (!this.canIAdminister() && (!this.grabbable || !this.amIHolding(p_propertyName))) {
3507 		return;
3508 	}
3509 	
3510 	if ( this.isSynchronized ) {
3511 		//give it to someone
3512 		var msg = new MessageItem();
3513 		msg.nodeName = this.batonNodeName;
3514 		msg.body = p_userID;
3515 		msg.itemID = p_propertyName;
3516 		this.collectionNode.publishItem(msg);
3517 	} else {
3518 		this.cachedBatonHolderID[p_propertyName] = p_userID;
3519 	}
3520 }
3521 
3522 /**
3523  * Extends the timeout if the BatonObject has one.
3524  * @param p_propertyName The id of the property  
3525  * @function
3526  */
3527 BatonObject.prototype.extendTimer = function(p_propertyName) 
3528 { 
3529 	if (this.autoReleaseTimers[p_propertyName]) {
3530 		if (this.autoReleaseTimers[p_propertyName].timer) {
3531 			clearTimeout(this.autoReleaseTimers[p_propertyName].timer);
3532 		}
3533 		this.autoReleaseTimers[p_propertyName].timer = null;
3534 		if (this.autoReleaseTimers[p_propertyName].delay) {
3535 			var delay =  this.autoReleaseTimers[p_propertyName].delay;
3536 			this.autoReleaseTimers[p_propertyName].timer = setTimeout( bindUsingClosure(this.onTimerComplete,this), delay, p_propertyName);
3537 		} else {
3538 			this.autoReleaseTimers[p_propertyName].timer = setTimeout( bindUsingClosure(this.onTimerComplete,this), (this.timeOut*1000), p_propertyName);
3539 		}
3540 	}
3541 }

3543 /**
3544  * The value of the BatonObjects property which a user can only set it if the user is in 
3545  * control of it.
3546  * <p>
3547  * If the BatonObject is not yet synchrnonized, the value will be cached and 
3548  * sent when the BatonProperty is back in sync.
3549  * <p>
3550  * If the BatonObjects property is available, setting the value will also try to grab 
3551  * control of the property before setting the value.
3552  * @param p_propertyName The key of the Property being added
3553  * @param p_value The value of the property, defaults to null
3554  * @function
3555  */
3556 BatonObject.prototype.setProperty = function(p_propertyName, p_value) 
3557 {
3558 	if (this.isSynchronized) {
3559 		if (this.isAvailable(p_propertyName)) {
3560 			if (!this.cachedValueForSetProp[p_propertyName]) {	//only toggle the first time
3561 				this.grab(p_propertyName);
3562 			}
3563 			this.cachedValueForSetProp[p_propertyName] = p_value; //overwrite the value that will eventually be published
3564 		} else if (this.amIHolding(p_propertyName)){
3565 			var args = new Array();
3566 			args.push(p_propertyName);
3567 			args.push(p_value);
3568 			SharedObject.prototype.setProperty.apply(this,args) ;
3569 			delete this.cachedValueForSetProp[p_propertyName];
3570 		}
3571 	}
3572 }
3573 
3574 /**
3575  * The value of the BatonObjects property which a user can only delete it if the user is in 
3576  * control of it.
3577  * <p>
3578  * If the BatonObject is not yet synchrnonized, the value will be cached and 
3579  * deleted when the BatonProperty is back in sync.
3580  * <p>
3581  * If the BatonObjects property is available, deleting the value will also try to grab 
3582  * control of the property before deleting the value and then release the control as well.
3583  * @param p_propertyName The key of the Property that needs to be retracted from the BatonObject.
3584  * @function
3585  */
3586 BatonObject.prototype.removeProperty = function(p_propertyName) 
3587 {
3588 	if (this.isAvailable(p_propertyName)) {
3589 		if (!this.cachedValueForDeleteProp[p_propertyName]) {	//only toggle the first time
3590 			this.grab(p_propertyName);
3591 		}
3592 		this.cachedValueForDeleteProp[p_propertyName] = "someRandomValue"; //overwrite the value that will eventually be published
3593 	} else if (this.amIHolding(p_propertyName)){
3594 		//putDown(p_propertyName);
3595 		var args = new Array();
3596 		args.push(p_propertyName);
3597 		SharedObject.prototype.removeProperty.apply(this,args) ;
3598 		//delete _cachedValueForDeleteProp [p_propertyName];
3599 	}
3600 }

3602 /**
3603  * Calls the <code>removeProperty</code> for all the properties in the BatonObject. It would delete all the properties that are
3604  * avialable or properties that you are holding.
3605  * @function
3606  */
3607 BatonObject.prototype.removeAll = function() 
3608 { 
3609 	for (var propertyName in this.sharedObject) {
3610 		this.removeProperty(propertyName);
3611 	}

3614 /**
3615  * @private
3616  */
3617 BatonObject.prototype.onTimerComplete = function(args) 
3618 { 
3619 	for (var i in this.autoReleaseTimers) {
3620 		if (this.autoReleaseTimers[i].timer &&  args && i == args) {
3621 			this.collectionNode.retractItem(this.batonNodeName,i);
3622 			clearTimeout(this.autoReleaseTimers[i].timer);
3623 			this.autoReleaseTimers[i].timer = undefined;
3624 			break;
3625 		}
3626 	}
3627 }

3629 /**
3630  * @private
3631  */
3632 BatonObject.prototype.synchronizationChange = function(p_evt) 
3633 { 
3634 	if (!this.userManager && this.connectSession) {
3635 		this.userManager = this.connectSession.userManager;
3636 	}
3637 
3638 	var args = new Array();
3639 	args.push(p_evt);
3640 	SharedObject.prototype.synchronizationChange.apply(this,args) ;
3641 
3642 	if (this.isSynchronized) {
3643 		if (!this.collectionNode.isNodeDefined(this.batonNodeName)) {	//we're the first ones here
3644 			var nodeConf = new Object();
3645 			nodeConf.accessModel = 10;
3646 			nodeConf.publishModel = this.pubModelForControlling;
3647 			nodeConf.modifyAnyItem = false;
3648 			nodeConf.userDependentItems = true;
3649 			this.collectionNode.createNode(this.batonNodeName, nodeConf);
3650 		}
3651 		
3652 		if (this.holderID && this.cachedBatonHolderID) {	//this will work but I don't like it...we might want to use _holderIDSetFromNetwork:Boolean
3653 			for (var i in this.cachedBatonHolderID) {
3654 				if ( this.getUserRole(this.userManager.myUserID) >= this.pubModelForYanking ) {
3655 					//giveTo(_cachedBatonHolderID);
3656 					this.giveTo(this.cachedBatonHolderID[i],i);
3657 				} else if ( this.canIGrab && this.cachedBatonHolderID[i] == this.userManager.myUserID ) {
3658 					this.grab(this.cachedBatonHolderID[i]);
3659 				}
3660 				delete this.cachedBatonHolderID[i];
3661 			}
3662 		}
3663 	} else {
3664 		//clean up model!
3665 		this.stopAllTimers();
3666 		this.cachedBatonHolderID = null;
3667 		this.holderID = null;
3668 	}
3669 	
3670 }
3671 
3672 /**
3673  * @private
3674  */
3675 BatonObject.prototype.itemReceive = function(p_evt) 
3676 { 
3677 	var theItem = p_evt.item;
3678 	if (!this.userManager && this.connectSession) {
3679 		this.userManager = this.connectSession.userManager;
3680 	}
3681 	
3682 	if (theItem.nodeName == this.batonNodeName) {
3683 		this.holderID[theItem.itemID] = theItem.body;	
3684 		if (this.cachedBatonHolderID[theItem.itemID]) {
3685 			delete this.cachedBatonHolderID[theItem.itemID];
3686 		}
3687 		if (this.amIHolding(theItem.itemID)) {
3688 			if ((this.autoReleaseTimers[theItem.itemID] && this.autoReleaseTimers[theItem.itemID].delay>0) || this.timeOut > 0) {
3689 				this.createTimer(theItem.itemID);
3690 			}
3691 		}
3692 		var evt = new Object();
3693 		evt.type = "batonHolderChange";
3694 		evt.PROPERTY_ID = theItem.itemID;
3695 		evt.currentTarget = evt.target = this;
3696 		if (this.cachedValueForSetProp[theItem.itemID]) {
3697 			if (this.isSynchronized && this.amIHolding(theItem.itemID)) {
3698 				var args = new Array();
3699 				args.push(theItem.itemID);
3700 				args.push(this.cachedValueForSetProp[theItem.itemID]);
3701 				SharedObject.prototype.setProperty.apply(this,args);
3702 				delete this.cachedValueForSetProp[theItem.itemID];
3703 			}
3704 		} else if (this.cachedValueForDeleteProp[theItem.itemID]) {
3705 			if (this.isSynchronized && this.amIHolding(theItem.itemID)) {
3706 				this.removeProperty(theItem.itemID);
3707 				delete this.cachedValueForDeleteProp[theItem.itemID];
3708 			}
3709 		}
3710 		this.dispatchEvent(evt);
3711 	} else {
3712 		var args = new Array();
3713 		args.push(p_evt);
3714 		SharedObject.prototype.itemReceive.apply(this,args) ;
3715 	}
3716 }
3717 
3718 /**
3719  * @private
3720  */
3721 BatonObject.prototype.itemRetract = function(p_evt) 
3722 {
3723 	var theItem = p_evt.item;
3724 	if (p_evt.nodeName == this.batonNodeName) {			//no need to check the itemID, I only have one
3725 		delete this.holderID[theItem.itemID];
3726 		delete this.cachedBatonHolderID[theItem.itemID];
3727 		if (this.autoReleaseTimers[theItem.itemID] && this.autoReleaseTimers[theItem.itemID].timer) {
3728 			clearTimeout(this.autoReleaseTimers[theItem.itemID].timer);
3729 			this.autoReleaseTimers[theItem.itemID].timer = undefined;
3730 		}
3731 		//super.removeProperty(theItem.itemID);
3732 		var evt = new Object();
3733 		evt.type = "batonHolderChange";
3734 		evt.PROPERTY_ID = theItem.itemID;
3735 		evt.currentTarget = evt.target = this;
3736 		this.dispatchEvent(evt);
3737 	}else {
3738 		//super.onItemRetract(p_evt);
3739 		var args = new Array();
3740 		args.push(p_evt);
3741 		SharedObject.prototype.itemRetract.apply(this,args);
3742 		delete this.cachedValueForDeleteProp[theItem.itemID];
3743 		if (this.amIHolding(theItem.itemID)) {
3744 			this.putDown(theItem.itemID);
3745 		}
3746 	}
3747 }
3748 
3749 /**
3750  * @private
3751  */
3752 BatonObject.prototype.commitProperties = function() 
3753 { 
3754 	var nodeConf ;
3755 
3756 	if ( this.publishModel != -1 && this.collectionNode.getNodeConfiguration(this.batonNodeName).publishModel != this.publishModel ){
3757 		nodeConf = this.collectionNode.getNodeConfiguration(this.batonNodeName) ;
3758 		nodeConf.publishModel = this.publishModel ;
3759 		this.collectionNode.setNodeConfiguration(this.batonNodeName,nodeConf );
3760 	}
3761 	
3762 	if ( this.accessModel != -1 && this.collectionNode.getNodeConfiguration(this.batonNodeName).accessModel != this.accessModel ){
3763 		nodeConf = this.collectionNode.getNodeConfiguration(this.batonNodeName) ;
3764 		nodeConf.accessModel = this.accessModel ;
3765 		this.collectionNode.setNodeConfiguration(this.batonNodeName, nodeConf ) ;
3766 	}
3767 }
3768 
3769 /**
3770  * @private
3771  */
3772 BatonObject.prototype.createTimer = function(p_timerID) 
3773 { 
3774 	if (!this.autoReleaseTimers[p_timerID] || (this.autoReleaseTimers[p_timerID] && !this.autoReleaseTimers[p_timerID].timer)) {
3775 		if (this.autoReleaseTimers[p_timerID] && this.autoReleaseTimers[p_timerID].delay) {
3776 			var delay =  this.autoReleaseTimers[p_timerID].delay;
3777 			this.autoReleaseTimers[p_timerID].timer = setTimeout( bindUsingClosure(this.onTimerComplete,this), delay, p_timerID);
3778 		} else {
3779 			if (!this.autoReleaseTimers[p_timerID]) {
3780 				this.autoReleaseTimers[p_timerID] = new Object();
3781 			}
3782 			this.autoReleaseTimers[p_timerID].timer = setTimeout( bindUsingClosure(this.onTimerComplete,this), (this.timeOut*1000), p_timerID);
3783 		}
3784 	}
3785 }
3786 
3787 /**
3788  * @private
3789  */
3790 BatonObject.prototype.stopAllTimers = function() 
3791 { 
3792 	for (var i in this.autoReleaseTimers) {
3793 		if (i.timer) {
3794 			clearTimeOut(i.timer);
3795 		}
3796 		delete this.autoReleaseTimers[i];
3797 	}
3798 }

3800 /**
3801  * @class SharedCollection is a simple ArrayCollection which is shared across the LCCS services. Useful for sharing the contents
3802  * of a List or Datagrid (or any other component with a dataProvider), it supports the general addItem, setItemAt, removeItemAt,
3803  * and removeAll methods for updating the collection. Any changes through these APIs are shared with other users subscribed to 
3804  * the collection. Note, however, that changing a collection's object properties without calling setItemAt to update them results
3805  * in those properties not being shared.
3806  * <p>
3807  * The collection does not share sort order: Any sorting desired should be performed on each respective client. As such,
3808  * addItemAt isn't supported, although addItem is. The collection makes update decisions on items based on a unique ID.
3809  * Items added to the collection should either implement the IUID interface or provide a field which is guaranteed to be unique 
3810  * for this collection. The SharedCollection exposes an <code>idField</code> property to specify which 
3811  * field to use as unique ID; in the case the items do not implement IUID.
3812  * <p>
3813  * The SharedCollection exposes the ability to set NodeConfiguration options for the node upon which the items are sent. In this way
3814  * the collection can have its access and publish rights assigned as well as the other settings allowed by NodeConfiguration.
3815  * Note that this component supports "piggybacking" on existing CollectionNodes through its <code>collectionNode</code> property
3816  * and its subscribe method. Developers can avoid CollectionNode proliferation in their applications by pre-supplying a CollectionNode 
3817  * to the <code>collectionNode</code> property and a <code>nodeName</code> (in the subscribe method) 
3818  * for the SharedCollection to use. If none is supplied, the SharedCollection will create its own collectionNode named for the 
3819  * <code>uniqueID</code> supplied in subscribe()for sending and receiving messages.
3820  * <table><tr><th><b>Event</b></th><th><b>Summary</b></th></tr>
3821  * <tr><td valign="top"><code>collectionChange </code></td> <td> Dispatched when the Collection has been updated in some way.</td></tr>
3822  * <tr><td valign="top"><code>reconnect</code></td> <td> The type of event emitted when the CollectionNode is about to reconnect to the server.</td></tr>
3823  * <tr><td valign="top"><code>synchronizationChange</code></td> <td> Dispatched when the SharedCollection goes in and out of sync with the service.</td></tr>
3824  * </table>
3825  * 
3826  */
3827 function SharedCollection() {
3828 	this.connectSession = ConnectSession.primarySession;
3829 	this.sharedArray = new Array();
3830 	this.source = this.sharedArray;
3831 }
3832 EventDispatcher.initialize(SharedCollection.prototype);
3833 
3834 /**
3835  * Defines the logical location of the component on the service. Typically this assigns the <code>sharedID</code> of the collectionNode
3836  * used by the component. <code>sharedIDs</code> should be unique within a room if they're expressing 2 unique locations. Note that
3837  * this can only be assigned once before <code>subscribe()</code> is called. For components with an <code>id</code> property, 
3838  * <code>sharedID</code> defaults to that value.
3839  */
3840 SharedCollection.prototype.sharedID;
3841 /**
3842  * The ConnectSession with which this component is associated. Note that this may only be set once before <code>subscribe</code>
3843  * is called; re-sessioning of components is not supported.
3844  */
3845 SharedCollection.prototype.connectSession = undefined;
3846 /**
3847  * Specifies an existing collectionNode to use in case a developer wishes to supply their own, and avoid having the 
3848  * sharedCollection create a new one.
3849  */
3850 SharedCollection.prototype.collectionNode;
3851 
3852 /**
3853  * @private
3854  */
3855 SharedCollection.prototype.ITEM_NODE = "itemNode";
3856 /**
3857  * @private
3858  */
3859 SharedCollection.prototype.nodeConfig;
3860 /**
3861  * @private
3862  */
3863 SharedCollection.prototype.nodeName = "itemNode";
3864 /**
3865  * @private
3866  */
3867 SharedCollection.prototype.myUserID;
3868 
3869 /**
3870  * If each item doesn't implement IUID, specifies a field within the item to use as a unique ID.
3871  */
3872 SharedCollection.prototype.idField;
3873 /**
3874  * If each item doesn't implement IUID, specifies a field within the item to use as a unique ID.
3875  */
3876 SharedCollection.prototype.sharedArray = undefined;
3877 
3878 SharedCollection.prototype.source = undefined;

3881 /**
3882  * Returns whether or not the sharedCollection has retrieved any information previously stored on the service, and 
3883  * is currently connected to the service. 
3884  */
3885 SharedCollection.prototype.isSynchronized = function()
3886 {
3887 	if (this.collectionNode) {
3888 		return this.collectionNode.isSynchronized;
3889 	} else {
3890 		return false;
3891 	}
3892 }
3893 /**
3894  * Sets the node configuration.
3895  * @param p_nodeConfig The node configuration..
3896  */
3897 SharedCollection.prototype.setNodeConfiguration = function(p_nodeConfig)
3898 {
3899 	this.nodeConfig = p_nodeConfig ;
3900 	if ( isSynchronized ) {
3901 		this.collectionNode.setNodeConfiguration(this.nodeName,this.nodeConfig);
3902 	}
3903 }

3905 /**
3906  * Disposes all listeners to the network and framework classes. 
3907  * Recommended for proper garbage collection of the component.
3908  */
3909 SharedCollection.prototype.close = function()
3910 {	
3911 	this.collectionNode.removeEventListener("synchronizationChange", this);
3912 	this.collectionNode.removeEventListener("itemReceive", this);
3913 	this.collectionNode.removeEventListener("itemRetract", this);
3914 	this.collectionNode.removeEventListener("reconnect", this);
3915 	this.collectionNode.unsubscribe();
3916 	this.collectionNode = null;
3917 }
3918 
3919 /**
3920  * Tells the component to begin synchronizing with the service.  
3921  * For "headless" components such as this one, this method must be called explicitly.
3922  */
3923 SharedCollection.prototype.subscribe = function()
3924 {
3925 	if ( this.nodeConfig == null ) {
3926 		this.nodeConfig = new NodeConfiguration();
3927 	}
3928 	
3929 	this.nodeConfig.itemStorageScheme = 2;
3930 	
3931 	if (!this.collectionNode) {
3932 		this.collectionNode = new CollectionNode();
3933 		this.collectionNode.sharedID = this.sharedID ;
3934 		this.collectionNode.connectSession = this.connectSession ;
3935 		this.collectionNode.subscribe();
3936 	}
3937 	this.collectionNode.addEventListener("synchronizationChange", this);
3938 	this.collectionNode.addEventListener("itemReceive", this);
3939 	this.collectionNode.addEventListener("itemRetract", this);
3940 	this.collectionNode.addEventListener("reconnect", this);
3941 }
3942 
3943 /**
3944  * Replaces the item at the specified index.
3945  * @param The new item to set.
3946  * @param The index of the item to replace. Note that this index is local-only; on remote collections, it's the unique ID
3947  * of the item which is used to locate and replace the item. 
3948  * @return The item previously at this location.
3949  */
3950 SharedCollection.prototype.setItemAt = function(p_item, p_index)
3951 {
3952 	var oldItem = this.getItemAt(p_index);
3953 	var msg = new MessageItem();
3954 	msg.nodeName = this.nodeName;
3955 	msg.body = p_item;
3956 	msg.itemID = this.getItemID(oldItem);
3957 	
3958 	this.collectionNode.publishItem(msg, true);
3959 	return oldItem;
3960 }
3961 
3962 /**
3963  * Adds the specified item to the end of the list. 
3964  * @param p_item The item to add.
3965  */
3966 SharedCollection.prototype.addItem = function(p_item)
3967 {
3968 	var msg = new MessageItem();
3969 	msg.nodeName = this.nodeName;
3970 	msg.body = p_item;
3971 	msg.itemID = this.getItemID(p_item);
3972 	this.collectionNode.publishItem(msg);
3973 }
3974 
3975 /**
3976  * Removes the item at the specified index.
3977  * @param p_index The index of the item to remove. Note that this index is local-only; on remote collections, it's the 
3978  * unique ID of the item which is used to locate and remove the item.
3979  * @return The item preivously at this location.
3980  * 
3981  */		
3982 SharedCollection.prototype.removeItemAt = function(p_index)
3983 {
3984 	var oldItem = this.getItemAt(p_index);
3985 	this.collectionNode.retractItem(this.nodeName, this.getItemID(oldItem));
3986 	return oldItem;
3987 }
3988 
3989 /**
3990  * Removes all items in the collection.
3991  */		
3992 SharedCollection.prototype.removeAll = function()
3993 {
3994 	for (var i=this.sharedArray.length-1; i>=0; i--) {
3995 		this.removeItemAt(i);
3996 	}
3997 }

3999 /**
4000  * @private
4001  */
4002 SharedCollection.prototype.synchronizationChange = function(p_evt)
4003 {
4004 	if ( this.collectionNode.isSynchronized ) {
4005 		this.myUserID = this.connectSession.userManager.myUserID;
4006 		if (!this.collectionNode.isNodeDefined(this.nodeName) && this.collectionNode.canUserConfigure(this.myUserID, this.nodeName)) {
4007 			// this collectionNode has never been built, and I can add it...
4008 			this.collectionNode.createNode(this.nodeName, this.nodeConfig);
4009 		}
4010 	}
4011 	p_evt.target = p_evt.currentTarget = this;
4012 	this.dispatchEvent(p_evt);
4013 }
4014 
4015 /**
4016  * @private
4017  */
4018 SharedCollection.prototype.reconnect = function(p_evt)
4019 {
4020 	this.removeAll(this.sharedArray) ; //expand it
4021 	p_evt.target = p_evt.currentTarget = this;
4022 	this.dispatchEvent(p_evt);
4023 }
4024 
4025 /**
4026  * @private
4027  */
4028 SharedCollection.prototype.itemReceive = function(p_evt)
4029 {
4030 	if (p_evt.nodeName!=this.nodeName) {
4031 		return;
4032 	}
4033 	var newItem = p_evt.item.body;
4034 	var itemID = (this.idField) ? newItem[this.idField] : newItem.uid;
4035 	var oldItem;
4036 	var i;
4037 	// yes, this is ugly. Improve later
4038 	var l = this.sharedArray.length;
4039 	for (var idx=0; idx<l; idx++) {
4040 		if (itemID==this.getItemID(this.getItemAt(idx))) {
4041 			oldItem = this.getItemAt(idx);
4042 			break;
4043 		}
4044 	}
4045 	if (oldItem) {
4046 		// it's an item update
4047 		for (i in newItem) {
4048 			if (newItem[i]!=oldItem[i]) {
4049 				var tmpOldValue = oldItem[i];
4050 				oldItem[i] = newItem[i];
4051 				this.itemUpdated(oldItem, i, tmpOldValue, oldItem[i]); //expand
4052 			}
4053 		}
4054 		this.setLocalItemAt(this.sharedArray, oldItem, idx);
4055 	} else {
4056 		this.addLocalItem(this.sharedArray,newItem);
4057 	}
4058 }
4059 
4060 /**
4061  * @private
4062  */
4063 SharedCollection.prototype.itemRetract = function(p_evt)
4064 {
4065 	if (p_evt.nodeName!=this.nodeName) {
4066 		return;
4067 	}
4068 	var newItem = p_evt.item.body;
4069 	var itemID = (this.idField) ? newItem[this.idField] : newItem.uid;
4070 	
4071 	var oldItem;
4072 	// yes, this is ugly. Improve later
4073 	var l = this.sharedArray.length;
4074 	for (var idx=0; idx<l; idx++) {
4075 		if (itemID==this.getItemID(this.getItemAt(idx))) {
4076 			oldItem = this.getItemAt(idx);
4077 			break;
4078 		}
4079 	}
4080 	if (oldItem) {
4081 		this.removeLocalItemAt(this.sharedArray,idx);
4082 	}
4083 }
4084 
4085 /**
4086  * @private
4087  */
4088 SharedCollection.prototype.getItemID = function(p_item)
4089 {
4090 	var testID = (p_item.uid) ? p_item.uid : p_item[this.idField];
4091 	if (!testID) {
4092 		throw new Error("Each item in a sharedCollection requires a unique ID. Please have your items either implement mx.core.IUID, or " + 
4093 			"specify 'sharedCollection.idField' so that the collection knows which field of your item is unique."); 
4094 	} else {
4095 		return testID;
4096 	}
4097 }
4098 
4099 /**
4100  * @private
4101  */
4102 SharedCollection.prototype.getItemAt = function(p_index)
4103 {
4104 	if (p_index < 0 || p_index >= this.sharedArray.length)  {
4105 		throw new Error("Out of Bound Error");
4106 	}
4107 	return this.sharedArray[p_index];
4108 	
4109 }
4110 
4111 /**
4112  * @private
4113  */
4114 SharedCollection.prototype.removeLocalItemAt = function(p_array,p_index)
4115 {
4116 	var event = new Object();
4117 	event.type = "collectionChange";
4118 	event.kind = "remove";
4119 	event.location = p_index;
4120 	event.oldItem = p_array[p_index];
4121 	event.newItem = null;
4122 	p_array.splice(p_index, 1);
4123 	event.target = event.currentTarget = this;
4124 	this.dispatchEvent(event);
4125 	
4126 }
4127 
4128 /**
4129  * @private
4130  */
4131 SharedCollection.prototype.itemUpdated = function(item, property,oldValue,newValue)
4132 {
4133 	//dispatch an event
4134 	var event = new Object();
4135 	event.type = "collectionChange";
4136 	event.item = item;
4137 	event.property = property;
4138 	event.oldValue = oldValue
4139 	event.newValue = newValue;
4140 	event.target = event.currentTarget = this;
4141 	event.kind = "replace";
4142 	this.dispatchEvent(event);
4143 }
4144 /**
4145  * @private
4146  */
4147 SharedCollection.prototype.setLocalItemAt = function(p_array,p_item,p_index)
4148 {
4149 	if (p_index < 0 || p_index >= this.sharedArray.length)  {
4150 		throw new Error("Out of Bound Error");
4151 	}
4152 	var tmp = this.getItemAt(p_index);
4153 	this.sharedArray[p_index] = p_item;
4154 	var event = new Object;
4155 	event.type = "collectionChange";
4156 	event.kind = "replace";
4157 	event.location = p_index;
4158 	event.oldItem = tmp;
4159 	event.newItem = p_item;
4160 	event.target = event.currentTarget = this;
4161 	//this.dispatchEvent(event);
4162 }
4163 /**
4164  * @private
4165  */
4166 SharedCollection.prototype.addLocalItem = function(p_array,p_item)
4167 {
4168 	this.sharedArray[this.sharedArray.length] = p_item;
4169 	var event = new Object;
4170 	event.target = event.currentTarget = this;
4171 	event.type = "collectionChange";
4172 	event.kind = "add";
4173 	event.location = this.sharedArray.length -1;
4174 	event.oldItem = null;
4175 	event.newItem = p_item;
4176 	this.dispatchEvent(event);
4177 }
4178 /**
4179  * @private
4180  */
4181 SharedCollection.prototype.getItemIndex = function(p_item)
4182 {
4183 	for ( var i = 0; i < this.sharedArray.length ; i++ ) {
4184 		if (this.sharedArray[i] == p_item) {
4185 			return i;
4186 		}
4187 	}
4188 	return -1;
4189 }
4190 
4191 SharedCollection.prototype.contains = function(p_item)
4192 {
4193 	return this.getItemIndex(p_item) != -1;
4194 }
4195 
4196 SharedCollection.prototype.length = function()
4197 {
4198 	return this.sharedArray.length;
4199 }

4344  * @field
4345  */
4346 SimpleChatModel.prototype.connectSession = undefined;
4347 /**
4348  * Defines the logical location of the component on the service - typically the sharedID of the collectionNode
4349  * used by the component.
4350  * @field
4351  */
4352 SimpleChatModel.prototype.sharedID = "defaultSimpleChat";
4353 /**
4354  * The default color used in formatting messages for the user's name
4355  * @field
4356  */
4357 SimpleChatModel.prototype.nameColor = "0x000000";

4359  * The default color used in formatting messages for the timestamp
4360  * @field

4362 SimpleChatModel.prototype.timeStampColor = "0x999999";

4364 /**
4365  * Tells the component to begin synchronizing with the service.  
4366  * This method must be called explicitly.
4367  * @function
4368  */
4369 SimpleChatModel.prototype.subscribe= function()
4370 {
4371 	this.collectionNode = new CollectionNode();
4372 	this.collectionNode.sharedID = this.sharedID ;
4373 	this.collectionNode.connectSession = this.connectSession ;
4374 	this.collectionNode.addEventListener("synchronizationChange", this);
4375 	this.collectionNode.addEventListener("userRoleChange", this);
4376 	this.collectionNode.addEventListener("itemReceive", this);
4377 	this.collectionNode.addEventListener("itemRetract", this);
4378 	this.collectionNode.addEventListener("nodeDelete", this);
4379 	this.collectionNode.addEventListener("nodeCreate", this);
4380 	this.collectionNode.addEventListener("configurationChange", this);
4381 	this.collectionNode.addEventListener("reconnect", this);
4382 	this.collectionNode.subscribe();
4383 	
4384 	this.userManager = this.connectSession.userManager;
4385 	this.userManager.addEventListener("userCreate",this);
4386 	
4387 	this.usersTyping = new Array();
4388 	this.userWithoutUserDescriptorTyping = new Array();
4389 	
4390 	//this.typingTimer = new Timer(2000, 1);			
4391 	//this.typingTimer.addEventListener(TimerEvent.TIMER_COMPLETE, onTimerComplete);
4392 	//this.typingTimer = setTimeout(this.onTimerComplete,2000);
4393 }

4396 /**
4397  * Disposes all listeners to the network and framework classes. Recommended for 
4398  * proper garbage collection of the component.
4399  * @function
4400  */
4401 SimpleChatModel.prototype.close= function()
4402 {
4403 	this.collectionNode.removeEventListener("synchronizationChange", synchronizationChange);
4404 	this.collectionNode.removeEventListener("synchronizationChange", this);
4405 	this.collectionNode.removeEventListener("userRoleChange", this);
4406 	this.collectionNode.removeEventListener("itemReceive", this);
4407 	this.collectionNode.removeEventListener("itemRetract", this);
4408 	this.collectionNode.removeEventListener("nodeDelete", this);
4409 	this.collectionNode.removeEventListener("nodeCreate", this);
4410 	this.collectionNode.removeEventListener("configurationChange", this);
4411 	this.userManager.removeEventListener("userCreate",this);
4412 	
4413 	this.collectionNode.unsubscribe();
4414 	clearTimeout(this.typingTimer);
4415 }

4426 /**
4427  * Sends a message which is specified by the ChatMessageDescriptor.
4428  * 
4429  * @param p_msgDesc the message to send
4430  * @function
4431  */
4432 SimpleChatModel.prototype.sendMessage = function(p_msgDesc)
4433 {
4434 	//do this before the returns
4435 	//if (this.typingTimer.running) {
4436 	//      this.typingTimer.stop();
4437 	//    onTimerComplete();
4438 	//}
4439 	if(this.typingTimer) {
4440 		clearTimeout(this.typingTimer);
4441 		this.onTimerComplete();
4442 	}
4443 	
4444 	if (!this.collectionNode.isSynchronized) {
4445 		return;
4446 	}
4447 	
4448 	if (p_msgDesc.msg && p_msgDesc.msg.length < 0) {
4449 		return;	//we don't send empty messages
4450 	}
4451 	
4452 	if (p_msgDesc.recipient && !this.allowPrivateChat) {
4453 		//private messages are not allowed, return
4454 		return;
4455 	}
4456 	
4457 	p_msgDesc.displayName = this.userManager.getUserDescriptor(this.userManager.myUserID).displayName;
4458 	
4459 	var nodeName;
4460 	if (p_msgDesc.role) {
4461 		if (p_msgDesc.role==10) {
4462 			nodeName = this.HISTORY_NODE_EVERYONE;
4463 		} else if (p_msgDesc.role==50) {
4464 			nodeName = this.HISTORY_NODE_PARTICIPANTS;
4465 		} else {
4466 			nodeName = this.HISTORY_NODE_HOSTS;
4467 		}
4468 	} else {
4469 		nodeName = this.HISTORY_NODE_EVERYONE;
4470 	}
4471 	var msg = new Object();
4472 	msg.body = p_msgDesc;
4473 	msg.nodeName = nodeName;
4474 	if (p_msgDesc.recipient!=null) {
4475 		msg.recipientID = p_msgDesc.recipient;
4476 	}
4477 	if (p_msgDesc.role>this.collectionNode.getUserRole(this.userManager.myUserID, nodeName)) {
4478 		p_msgDesc.timeStamp = (new Date()).getTime();
4479 		this.addMsgToHistory(p_msgDesc);
4480 	}
4481 	this.collectionNode.publishItem(msg);
4482 }

4492 		return this.collectionNode.getNodeConfiguration(p_nodeName);
4493 	}
4494 	return null ;
4495 }

4511 /**
4512  * Set the role value required for publishing to the chat
4513  * @function
4514  */
4515 SimpleChatModel.prototype.setPublishModel = function(p_publishModel)
4516 {	
4517 	if ( p_publishModel < 0 || p_publishModel > 100 ) 
4518 		return ; 
4519 	
4520 	var nodeConf ;
4521 	
4522 	if ( this.collectionNode.getNodeConfiguration(this.HISTORY_NODE_EVERYONE).publishModel != p_publishModel ){
4523 		nodeConf = this.collectionNode.getNodeConfiguration(this.HISTORY_NODE_EVERYONE) ;
4524 		nodeConf.publishModel = p_publishModel ;
4525 		this.collectionNode.setNodeConfiguration(this.HISTORY_NODE_EVERYONE, nodeConf ) ;
4526 	}
4527 	
4528 	if ( this.collectionNode.getNodeConfiguration(this.HISTORY_NODE_HOSTS).publishModel != p_publishModel ){
4529 		nodeConf = this.collectionNode.getNodeConfiguration(this.HISTORY_NODE_HOSTS) ;
4530 		nodeConf.publishModel = p_publishModel ;
4531 		this.collectionNode.setNodeConfiguration(this.HISTORY_NODE_HOSTS, nodeConf ) ;
4532 	}
4533 	
4534 	if ( this.collectionNode.getNodeConfiguration(this.HISTORY_NODE_PARTICIPANTS).publishModel != p_publishModel ){
4535 		nodeConf = this.collectionNode.getNodeConfiguration(this.HISTORY_NODE_PARTICIPANTS) ;
4536 		nodeConf.publishModel = p_publishModel ;
4537 		this.collectionNode.setNodeConfiguration(this.HISTORY_NODE_PARTICIPANTS, nodeConf ) ;
4538 	}
4539 	
4540 	if ( this.collectionNode.getNodeConfiguration(TYPING_NODE_NAME).publishModel != p_publishModel ){
4541 		nodeConf = this.collectionNode.getNodeConfiguration(TYPING_NODE_NAME) ;
4542 		nodeConf.publishModel = p_publishModel ;
4543 		this.collectionNode.setNodeConfiguration(TYPING_NODE_NAME, nodeConf ) ;
4544 	}
4545 }

4609 {
4610 	if ( p_userID == null ) 
4611 		return ;
4612 	
4613

4615 		return ;

4618 		if ( this.collectionNode.isNodeDefined(p_nodeName)) {
4619 			this.collectionNode.setUserRole(p_userID,p_userRole,p_nodeName);
4620 		}
4621 	}else {
4622 		this.collectionNode.setUserRole(p_userID,p_userRole);
4623 	}

4628  * @function

4630 SimpleChatModel.prototype.clear= function()
4631 {
4632 	if (this.collectionNode.isSynchronized && this.collectionNode.canUserConfigure(this.userManager.myUserID)) {
4633 		this.collectionNode.removeNode(this.HISTORY_NODE_EVERYONE);
4634 		var nodeConfig = new Object();
4635 		nodeConfig.accessModel=10;
4636 		nodeConfig.publishModel=10;
4637 		nodeConfig.persistItems=true;
4638 		nodeConfig.modifyAnyItem=true;
4639 		nodeConfig.userDependentItems=false;
4640 		nodeConfig.sessionDependentItems=this.isClearAfterSessionRemoved;
4641 		nodeConfig.itemStorageScheme=1;
4642 		nodeConfig.allowPrivateMessages=false;
4643 		nodeConfig.lazySubscription=false;
4644 		nodeConfig.p2pDataMessaging=false;
4645 		this.collectionNode.createNode(this.HISTORY_NODE_EVERYONE, nodeConfig);
4646 		this.collectionNode.removeNode(this.HISTORY_NODE_PARTICIPANTS);
4647 		var partNodeConfig = new Object();
4648 		partNodeConfig.accessModel=50;
4649 		partNodeConfig.publishModel=10;
4650 		partNodeConfig.persistItems=true;
4651 		partNodeConfig.modifyAnyItem=false;
4652 		partNodeConfig.userDependentItems=false;
4653 		partNodeConfig.sessionDependentItems=this.isClearAfterSessionRemoved;
4654 		partNodeConfig.itemStorageScheme=1;
4655 		partNodeConfig.allowPrivateMessages=false;
4656 		partNodeConfig.lazySubscription=false;
4657 		partNodeConfig.p2pDataMessaging=false;
4658 		this.collectionNode.createNode(this.HISTORY_NODE_PARTICIPANTS,nodeConfig);
4659 		this.collectionNode.removeNode(this.HISTORY_NODE_HOSTS);
4660 		var hostNodeConfig = new Object();
4661 		hostNodeConfig.accessModel=100;
4662 		hostNodeConfig.publishModel=10;
4663 		hostNodeConfig.persistItems=true;
4664 		hostNodeConfig.modifyAnyItem=false;
4665 		hostNodeConfig.userDependentItems=false;
4666 		hostNodeConfig.sessionDependentItems=this.isClearAfterSessionRemoved;
4667 		hostNodeConfig.itemStorageScheme=1;
4668 		hostNodeConfig.allowPrivateMessages=false;
4669 		hostNodeConfig.lazySubscription=false;
4670 		hostNodeConfig.p2pDataMessaging=false;
4671 		this.collectionNode.createNode(this.HISTORY_NODE_HOSTS, nodeConfig);

4685 /**
4686  * Specifies the format of timestamps (see the constants on this class). 
4687  * Note that only a user with a publisher role or higher can change this setting.
4688  * @function
4689  */
4690 SimpleChatModel.prototype.setTimeFormat = function(p_timeFormat)
4691 {
4692 	switch (p_timeFormat) {
4693 		case this.TIMEFORMAT_24H:
4694 		case this.TIMEFORMAT_AM_PM:
4695 			break;
4696 		default:
4697 			return;
4698 	}
4699 	
4700 	if (this.timeFormat == p_timeFormat) {
4701 		return;
4702 	}
4703 	
4704 	if (this.collectionNode.canUserPublish(this.userManager.myUserID, this.TIMEFORMAT_NODE_NAME)) {
4705 		var msgItem = new Object();
4706 		msgItem.nodeName = this.TIMEFORMAT_NODE_NAME;
4707 		msgItem.body = p_timeFormat;
4708 		this.collectionNode.publishItem(msgItem);
4709 	}
4710 }

4749 /**
4750  * Specifies whether private chat is allowed. Note that only users with the
4751  * owner role can configure this setting.
4752  * @function
4753  */
4754 SimpleChatModel.prototype.setAllowPrivateChat = function(p_allowIt)
4755 {
4756 	if (this.allowPrivateChat == p_allowIt) {
4757 		return;
4758 	}
4759 	
4760 	if (this.collectionNode.canUserConfigure(this.userManager.myUserID, this.HISTORY_NODE_EVERYONE)) {
4761 		var oldConfig = this.collectionNode.getNodeConfiguration(this.HISTORY_NODE_EVERYONE);
4762 		var newConfig = new NodeConfiguration();
4763 		newConfig = oldConfig;
4764 		newConfig.allowPrivateMessages = p_allowIt;
4765 		this.collectionNode.setNodeConfiguration(HISTORY_NODE_EVERYONE, newConfig);
4766 	}

4769 /**
4770  * Returns a list of currently typing users as a string.
4771  * @function
4772  */
4773 SimpleChatModel.prototype.getUsersTyping = function()
4774 {
4775 	var res = "";
4776 	for (var i=0; i<this.usersTyping.length; i++) {
4777 		var userID = this.usersTyping[i];
4778 		var desc = this.userManager.getUserDescriptor(userID);
4779 		if (desc != null && userID!=this.userManager.myUserID) {
4780 			res+=((res=="") ? "" : ", ")+desc.displayName;
4781 		}
4782 	}
4783 	return res;
4784 }
4785 
4786 /**
4787  * Updates the model to notify others that the current user is typing. This is automatically withdrawn after 2 seconds, unless this method is called again
4788  * during that time, at which point the 2 second timeout is reset. Typically, chaining this call to a TextInput's CHANGE event is effective - iAmTyping will 
4789  * avoid re-broadcasting the notification if not needed.
4790  * @function
4791  */
4792 SimpleChatModel.prototype.iAmTyping= function()
4793 {			
4794 	if (!this.collectionNode.isSynchronized) {
4795 		return;
4796 	}
4797 	
4798 	if (!this.contains(this.usersTyping,this.userManager.myUserID)
4799 		&& this.usersTyping.length < this.TOO_MANY_TYPING_THRESHOLD
4800 	) {
4801 		//I'm not typing yet and we're below the threshold, publish my item
4802 		this.collectionNode.publishItem(new MessageItem(TYPING_NODE_NAME, this.userManager.myUserID, this.userManager.myUserID));
4803 		
4804 		//the receiveItem will start the timer
4805 	}				
4806 	
4807 	//Extend the timer if it's running (and it's only running if we received our own typing item)
4808 	this.typingTimer = setTimeout( bindUsingClosure(this.onTimerComplete,this), 2000);
4809 }
4810 
4811 /**
4812  *@private
4813  */
4814 SimpleChatModel.prototype.onTimerComplete = function(args)
4815 {
4816 	if (args && this.contains(args.usersTyping, args.userManager.myUserID)) {
4817 		args.collectionNode.retractItem(TYPING_NODE_NAME, args.userManager.myUserID);
4818 	}
4819 }

4831 	this.dispatchEvent(p_evt);
4832 }

4857 			partNodeConfig.accessModel=50;

4879 			hostNodeConfig.p2pDataMessaging=false;

4898 			msgItem.body = this.TIMEFORMAT_AM_PM;

4900

4906 			this.userManager = this.connectSession.userManager;

4913 /**
4914  *@private
4915  */
4916 SimpleChatModel.prototype.itemReceive = function(p_event)
4917 {
4918 	var item = p_event.item;
4919 	if (this.userManager) {
4920 		var tmpUsrDesc;
4921 		if (item.publisherID) {
4922 			tmpUsrDesc = this.userManager.getUserDescriptor(item.publisherID);
4923 		} else {
4924 			tmpUsrDesc = this.userManager.getUserDescriptor(item.itemID);
4925 		}
4926 	}
4927 	
4928 	switch (item.nodeName)
4929 	{
4930 		case this.HISTORY_NODE_PARTICIPANTS:
4931 		case this.HISTORY_NODE_HOSTS:
4932 		case this.HISTORY_NODE_EVERYONE:
4933 			//add it to the history
4934 			
4935 			
4936 			var msgDesc = new Object();
4937 			msgDesc = item.body;
4938 			if (this.messagesSeen[item.itemID]) {
4939 				return;
4940 			}
4941 			this.messagesSeen[item.itemID] = true;
4942 			if (item.recipientID!=null) {
4943 				msgDesc.recipient = item.recipientID;
4944 			}
4945 			if (item.nodeName==this.HISTORY_NODE_HOSTS) {
4946 				msgDesc.role = 100;
4947 			} else if (item.nodeName==this.HISTORY_NODE_PARTICIPANTS) {
4948 				msgDesc.role = 50;
4949 			}
4950 			msgDesc.timeStamp = item.timeStamp;
4951 			msgDesc.publisherID = item.publisherID;
4952 			this.addMsgToHistory(msgDesc);				
4953 			break;
4954 		case this.TYPING_NODE_NAME:
4955 			if (!this.contains(this.addMsgToHistory, item.itemID)) {
4956 				if (item.itemID == this.userManager.myUserID) {
4957 					this.usersTyping.push(item.itemID);
4958 					//we got our own item back, start the timer
4959 					if(this.typingTimer) {
4960 						clearTimeout(this.typingTimer);
4961 						this.typingTimer = setTimeout( bindUsingClosure(this.onTimerComplete,this), 2000);
4962 					}
4963 					p_evt.currentTarget = p_evt.target = this;
4964 					p_evt.type = "typingListUpdate";
4965 					this.dispatchEvent(p_evt);
4966 				} else if (this.userManager.getUserDescriptor(item.itemID)) {
4967 					this.usersTyping.push(item.itemID);
4968 					p_evt.currentTarget = p_evt.target = this;
4969 					p_evt.type = "typingListUpdate";
4970 					this.dispatchEvent(p_evt);
4971 				} else {
4972 					this.userWithoutUserDescriptorTyping.push(item.itemID);
4973 				}
4974 				
4975 			}
4976 			break;
4977 		case this.TIMEFORMAT_NODE_NAME:
4978 			this.timeFormat = item.body;
4979 			p_evt.currentTarget = p_evt.target = this;
4980 			p_evt.type = "timeFormatChange";
4981 			this.dispatchEvent(p_evt);
4982 			break;
4983 		case this.USE_TIMESTAMPS_NODE_NAME:
4984 			this.useTimeStamps = item.body;
4985 			p_evt.currentTarget = p_evt.target = this;
4986 			p_evt.type = "useTimeStampsChange";
4987 			this.dispatchEvent(new ChatEvent(ChatEvent.USE_TIME_STAMPS_CHANGE));
4988 			break;
4989 	}
4990 }
4991

4995 SimpleChatModel.prototype.userCreate = function(p_evt)
4996 {
4997 	if (this.contains(this.userWithoutUserDescriptorTyping,p_evt.userDescriptor.userID)) {
4998 		this.usersTyping.push(p_evt.userDescriptor.userID);
4999 		p_evt.currentTarget = p_evt.target = this;
5000 		p_evt.type = "typingListUpdate";
5001 		this.dispatchEvent(p_evt);
5002 		this.removeItem(this.userWithoutUserDescriptorTyping,p_evt.userDescriptor.userID);
5003 	}
5004 }

5006 /**
5007  *@private
5008  */
5009 SimpleChatModel.prototype.getNameColor = function(p_msgDesc)
5010 {
5011 	if (p_msgDesc.recipient!=null) {
5012 		// it was a message I sent privately to another
5013 		return this.COLOR_PRIVATE;
5014 	} else if (p_msgDesc.role>UserRoles.VIEWER)	{
5015 		// it was a message sent to a role group, and I can see it (either because I sent it or am in the group)
5016 		return this.COLOR_HOSTS;
5017 	} else {
5018 		return this.nameColor+"";
5019 	}
5020 }

5022 /**
5023  *@private
5024  */
5025 SimpleChatModel.prototype.getMsgColor = function(p_msgDesc)
5026 {
5027 	if (p_msgDesc.recipient!=null) {
5028 		// it was a message I sent privately to another
5029 		return this.COLOR_PRIVATE;
5030 	} else if (p_msgDesc.role>10)	{
5031 		// it was a message sent to a role group, and I can see it (either because I sent it or am in the group)
5032 		return this.COLOR_HOSTS;
5033 	} else {
5034 		if (p_msgDesc.color) {
5035 			return p_msgDesc.color;
5036 		}
5037 	}
5038 	return this.COLOR_HOSTS;
5039 }

5070 		// it was a message I sent privately to another
5071 		return this.COLOR_PRIVATE;
5072 	} else if (p_msgDesc.role>UserRoles.VIEWER)	{
5073 		// it was a message sent to a role group, and I can see it (either because I sent it or am in the group)
5074 		return this.COLOR_HOSTS;

5080 /**
5081  * Formats a given MessageDescriptor into a readable string
5082  * @param p_msgDesc the desired ChatMessageDescriptor to format
5083  * @function
5084  */
5085 SimpleChatModel.prototype.formatMessageDescriptor = function(p_msgDesc)
5086 {
5087 	var timeStampStr = "";
5088 	
5089 	var nameColor = this.getNameColor(p_msgDesc);
5090 	var msgColor = this.getMsgColor(p_msgDesc);
5091 	var tStampColor = this.getTimeStampColor(p_msgDesc);			
5092 	
5093 	var privateModifier = "";
5094 	
5095 	if (p_msgDesc.publisherID == this.userManager.myUserID && p_msgDesc.recipient!=null) {
5096 		// it was a message I sent privately to another
5097 		privateModifier = " (to"+" "+p_msgDesc.recipientDisplayName+")";
5098 	} else if (p_msgDesc.role>UserRoles.VIEWER)	{
5099 		// it was a message sent to a role group, and I can see it (either because I sent it or am in the group)
5100 		privateModifier = " (to"+" "+((p_msgDesc.role == UserRoles.OWNER)? "hosts" : "participants")+")";
5101 	} else if (p_msgDesc.recipient!=null) {
5102 		// it was a message sent privately to me
5103 		privateModifier = " ("+"privately"+")";
5104 	}
5105 	
5106 	if (this.useTimeStamps && !isNaN(p_msgDesc.timeStamp)) {
5107 		var d = new Date(p_msgDesc.timeStamp);
5108 		var hourMinutes = new Array();
5109 		hourMinutes.push = d.getHours();
5110 		hourMinutes.push = d.getMinutes();
5111 		if (hourMinutes[1] < 10) {	//pad minutes if needed
5112 			hourMinutes[1] = "0"+hourMinutes[1];
5113 		}
5114 		if (this.timeFormat == this.TIMEFORMAT_AM_PM) {
5115 			var timeTemplate = "%12%:%M% %D%";
5116 			timeTemplate = timeTemplate.replace("%M%", hourMinutes[1]);
5117 			var h = hourMinutes[0];
5118 			if (h >= 12) {
5119 				h -= 12;
5120 				timeTemplate = timeTemplate.replace("%D%", "pm");
5121 			} else {
5122 				timeTemplate = timeTemplate.replace("%D%", "am");
5123 			}
5124 			if (h == 0) {
5125 				timeStampStr = timeTemplate.replace("%12%", "12");
5126 			} else {
5127 				timeStampStr = timeTemplate.replace("%12%", h);
5128 			}
5129 		} else {
5130 			timeStampStr = hourMinutes[0]+":"+hourMinutes[1];
5131 		}
5132 		timeStampStr = "<font color=\"#"+tStampColor+"\">["+timeStampStr+"]</font> ";
5133 	}
5134 	
5135 	var msg = p_msgDesc.msg;
5136 	msg = msg.replace(/</g, "<");
5137 	msg = msg.replace(/>/g, ">");
5138 	
5139 	//TODO: make these colors come from a style!
5140 	var toAdd;
5141 	toAdd = "<font size=\""+this.historyFontSize+"\">"
5142 		+timeStampStr
5143 		+"<font color=\"#"+nameColor+"\"><b>"+p_msgDesc.displayName+privateModifier+"</b>: </font>"
5144 		+"<font color=\"#"+msgColor+"\">"+msg+"</font>"
5145 		+"</font><br/>";
5146 	
5147 	return toAdd;
5148 }

5151 /**
5152  *@private
5153  */
5154 SimpleChatModel.prototype.addMsgToHistory = function(p_msgDesc)
5155 {
5156 	//var toAdd = this.formatMessageDescriptor(p_msgDesc);
5157 	var toAdd;
5158 	if (p_msgDesc instanceof Array) {
5159 		//toAdd = p_msgDesc[1]+":"+p_msgDesc[2]+"\n";
5160 		for (var i in p_msgDesc)
5161 		{
5162 			if (toAdd) {
5163 				toAdd = toAdd + p_msgDesc[i];
5164 			} else {
5165 				toAdd = p_msgDesc[i];
5166 			}
5167 		}
5168 		toAdd = toAdd + "\n";
5169 	} else if (p_msgDesc instanceof Object) {
5170 		toAdd = p_msgDesc.displayName+":"+p_msgDesc.msg+"\n";
5171 		//toAdd = p_msgDesc["displayName"]+":"+p_msgDesc["msg"]+"\n";
5172 	}
5173 	//var toAdd = p_msgDesc;
5174 	var p_evt = new Object();
5175 	if (this.chatCleared) {
5176 		this.history=toAdd;
5177 		this.chatCleared = false;
5178 		p_evt.currentTarget = p_evt.target = this;
5179 		p_evt.message = p_msgDesc;
5180 		p_evt.type = "historyChange";
5181 		this.dispatchEvent(p_evt);
5182 	} else {
5183 		this.history+=toAdd;
5184 		p_evt.currentTarget = p_evt.target = this;
5185 		p_evt.message = p_msgDesc;
5186 		p_evt.type = "historyChange";
5187 		this.dispatchEvent(p_evt);
5188 	}
5189 	
5190 }

5207 		
5208 		if (this.contains(this.userWithoutUserDescriptorTyping,item.itemID)) {
5209 			this.removeItem(this.userWithoutUserDescriptorTyping,item.itemID);	
5210 		}

5254  *@private
5255  *Contains code snippet copied from StackOverflow
5256  *http://stackoverflow.com/questions/237104/javascript-array-containsobj
5257  */
5258 SimpleChatModel.prototype.contains = function(p_array, obj) {
5259 	var i = p_array.length;
5260 	while (i--) {
5261 		if (p_array[i] === obj) {
5262 			return true;
5263 		}
5264 	}
5265 	return false;
5266 }

5268 /**
5269  *@private
5270  */
5271 SimpleChatModel.prototype.removeItem = function(p_array, itemToRemove) {
5272 	var j = 0;
5273 	while (j < p_array.length) {
5274 		if (p_array[j] == itemToRemove) {
5275 			p_array.splice(j, 1);
5276 		} else {
5277 			j++;
5278 		}
5279 	}
5280 }

5284 /**
5285  * @class SharedCursor tracks the cursor positions of any user with role of UserRoles.PUBLISHER or higher within it and reports that position to other users.
5286  * It is also responsible for rendering the remote cursors corresponding to these positions.
5287  * <table><tr><th><b>Event</b></th><th><b>Summary</b></th></tr>
5288  * <tr><td valign="top"><code>synchronizationChange</code></td> <td> Dispatched when the SimpleChatModel has fully connected and synchronized with the service or when it loses that connection.</td></tr>
5289  * </table>
5290  * @constructor
5291  */
5292 function SharedCursorPane() {
5293 	this.connectSession = ConnectSession.primarySession;
5294 	this.initialize();
5295 }
5296 EventDispatcher.initialize(SharedCursorPane.prototype);

5317 SharedCursorPane.prototype.pollInterval = 500;

5328  * used by the component. <code>sharedIDs</code> should be unique within a room if they're expressing two 
5329  * unique locations. Note that this can only be assigned once before <code>subscribe()</code> is called. For components

5419 /**
5420  *Initialized the shared Cursor by passing the document. The document model is used to manipulate the mouse positions.
5421  * @function
5422  */
5423 SharedCursorPane.prototype.initialize = function()
5424 {
5425 	document.body.cursorTarget = this;
5426 	if (!this.width) {
5427 		this.width = document.documentElement.clientWidth;
5428 	}
5429 	if (!this.height) {
5430 		this.height = document.documentElement.clientHeight;
5431 	}
5432 }
5433 
5434 /**
5435  * Tells the component to begin synchronizing with the service. 
5436  * @function
5437  */
5438 SharedCursorPane.prototype.subscribe = function()
5439 {
5440 	if (!this.collectionNode) {
5441 		this.collectionNode = new CollectionNode();
5442 		this.collectionNode.sharedID = this.sharedID ;
5443 		this.collectionNode.connectSession = this.connectSession ;
5444 		this.collectionNode.addEventListener("synchronizationChange", this);
5445 		this.collectionNode.subscribe();
5446 	}
5447 	
5448 	this.userManager = this.connectSession.userManager;
5449 }
5450 
5451 /**
5452  * @private
5453  */
5454 SharedCursorPane.prototype.synchronizationChange = function(p_evt)
5455 {
5456 	if (this.collectionNode.isSynchronized) {
5457 		this.collectionNode.addEventListener("myRoleChange", this);
5458 		this.collectionNode.addEventListener("itemReceive", this);
5459 		this.collectionNode.addEventListener("itemRetract", this);
5460 		if (!this.collectionNode.isNodeDefined(this.nodeName) && this.collectionNode.canUserConfigure(this.userManager.myUserID)) {
5461 			var nodeConfig = new Object();
5462 			nodeConfig.userDependentItems = true;
5463 			nodeConfig.modifyAnyItem = false;
5464 			nodeConfig.itemStorageScheme = 2;
5465 			nodeConfig.accessModel = 10;
5466 			nodeConfig.publishModel = 50;
5467 			this.collectionNode.addEventListener("nodeCreate", this);
5468 			this.collectionNode.createNode(this.nodeName, nodeConfig);
5469 		} else {
5470 			if (!this.collectionNode.isNodeDefined(this.nodeName)) {
5471 				this.collectionNode.addEventListener("nodeCreate", this);
5472 			} else if (this.collectionNode.canUserPublish(this.userManager.myUserID, this.nodeName)) {
5473 				this.wasPublisher = true;
5474 				if (!document.body.onmousemove) {
5475 					document.body.onmousemove = this.onMouseMove;
5476 				}
5477 			}
5478 		}
5479 		if (this.userMgr) {
5480 			this.userMgr.addEventListener("userCreate",this);
5481 		}
5482 	} else {
5483 		this.removeMyEventListeners();
5484 	}
5485 	this.dispatchEvent(p_evt);
5486 }
5487 
5488 /**
5489  * @private
5490  */
5491 SharedCursorPane.prototype.myRoleChange = function(p_evt)
5492 {
5493 	// disable / enable 
5494 	if (this.wasPublisher && !this.collectionNode.canUserPublish(this.userManager.myUserID, this.nodeName)) {
5495 		this.removeMyEventListeners();
5496 		this.wasPublisher = false;
5497 	} else if (!this.wasPublisher && this.collectionNode.canUserPublish(this.userManager.myUserID, this.nodeName)) {
5498 		this.pointTimer = setTimeout(bindUsingClosure(this.sendMyCursor,this), this.pollInterval);
5499 		if(!document.body.onmousemove) {
5500 			document.body.onmousemove = this.onMouseMove;
5501 		}
5502 		this.wasPublisher = true;
5503 	}
5504 }
5505 
5506 /**
5507  * @private
5508  */
5509 SharedCursorPane.prototype.itemReceive = function(p_evt)
5510 {
5511 	if (p_evt.nodeName== this.nodeName) {
5512 		if (p_evt.item.publisherID!= this.userManager.myUserID) {
5513 			// we ignore our own cursor
5514 			var body = p_evt.item.body;
5515 			var screenX;
5516 			var screenY;
5517 			
5518 			var locWidth;
5519 			var locHeight;
5520 			//console.log(document.documentElement.clientWidth + " " + document.documentElement.clientHeight);
5521 			
5522 			if( typeof( window.innerWidth ) == 'number' ) {
5523 			    //Non-IE
5524 				locWidth = window.innerWidth;
5525 				locHeight = window.innerHeight;
5526 			} else if( document.documentElement && ( document.documentElement.clientWidth || document.documentElement.clientHeight ) ) {
5527 			    //IE 6+ in 'standards compliant mode'
5528 				  locWidth = document.documentElement.clientWidth;
5529 				  locHeight = document.documentElement.clientHeight;
5530 			} else if( document.body && ( document.body.clientWidth || document.body.clientHeight ) ) {
5531 			    //IE 4 compatible
5532 				  locWidth = document.body.clientWidth;
5533 				  locHeight = document.body.clientHeight;
5534 			}
5535 			
5536 			if ( this.sizingMode == "relative") {
5537 				screenX = body.x*(locWidth);
5538 				screenY = body.y*(locHeight);
5539 			}else if ( this.sizingMode == "absolute" ) {
5540 				screenX = body.x;
5541 				screenY = body.y;
5542 			}
5543 			//			this.document.body.ownerDocument.getElementById("msgArea").value = " " + screenX + " " + screenY;
5544 			//console.log("set w innerwidth " + body.x*(locWidth));
5545 			//console.log("set w docEle.clientwidth " + body.x*(document.documentElement.clientWidth));
5546 			//console.log("set w body.clientwidht " + body.x*(document.body.clientWidth));
5547 			if (this.cursorsByID && this.cursorsByID[p_evt.item.publisherID]!=null) {
5548 				//var tmp = document;
5549 				//console.log("Recieved " +  body.x + " " + body.y +" setting " + screenX + " " +  screenY + " w&h " + locWidth + " " + locHeight);
5550 				this.moveCursorTo(p_evt.item.publisherID, screenX, screenY);
5551 			} else {
5552 				this.addNewCursor(p_evt.item.publisherID, screenX, screenY);
5553 			}
5554 		} else {
5555 			this.cursorsByID[p_evt.item.publisherID] = true;
5556 		}
5557 	}	
5558 }
5559

5566 		this.removeCursor(p_evt.item.publisherID);
5567 	}

5578 /**
5579  * @private
5580  */
5581 SharedCursorPane.prototype.sendCursorWrapper = function()
5582 {
5583 	if (this && this.mouseX==this.lastMouseX && this.mouseY==this.lastMouseY) {
5584 		this.inactivityTimer = setTimeout(bindUsingClosure(this.onInactivity,this), this.inactivityInterval);
5585 		if(!document.body.onmousemove) {
5586 			document.body.onmousemove = this.onMouseMove;
5587 		}
5588 		clearTimeout(this.pointTimer);
5589 		this.pointTimer = null;
5590 		
5591 	} else {
5592 		var item = new Object() ;
5593 		if ( this.sizingMode == "relative" ) {
5594 			var locWidth;
5595 			var locHeight;
5596 			//console.log(document.documentElement.clientWidth + " " + document.documentElement.clientHeight);
5597 			
5598 			if( typeof( window.innerWidth ) == 'number' ) {
5599 			    //Non-IE
5600 				locWidth = window.innerWidth;
5601 				locHeight = window.innerHeight;
5602 			  } else if( document.documentElement && ( document.documentElement.clientWidth || document.documentElement.clientHeight ) ) {
5603 			    //IE 6+ in 'standards compliant mode'
5604 				  locWidth = document.documentElement.clientWidth;
5605 				  locHeight = document.documentElement.clientHeight;
5606 			  } else if( document.body && ( document.body.clientWidth || document.body.clientHeight ) ) {
5607 			    //IE 4 compatible
5608 				  locWidth = document.body.clientWidth;
5609 				  locHeight = document.body.clientHeight;
5610 			  }
5611 
5612 			
5613 			var relativeX = this.mouseX/locWidth;
5614 			var relativeY = this.mouseY/locHeight;
5615 			item.nodeName = this.nodeName;
5616 			var bodyObject = new Object();
5617 			bodyObject.x = relativeX;
5618 			bodyObject.y = relativeY;
5619 			item.body = bodyObject;
5620 			item.itemID = this.userManager.myUserID;
5621 			var tmp = document;
5622 			//console.log("Sending x & y as " + relativeX +" " +relativeY +" and the actual x & y " +this.mouseX + " " + this.mouseY + " w&h " + locWidth + " " + locHeight);
5623 		} else if ( this.sizingMode == "absolute" ) {
5624 			item.nodeName = this.nodeName;
5625 			var bodyObject = new Object();
5626 			bodyObject.x = this.mouseX;
5627 			bodyObject.y = this.mouseY;
5628 			item.body = bodyObject;
5629 			item.itemID = this.userManager.myUserID;
5630 			//console.log("Sending x & y as " +this.mouseX + " " + this.mouseY + " w&h " + locWidth + " " + locHeight);
5631 
5632 		}
5633 		
5634 		if (this.collectionNode.isSynchronized) {
5635 			// safety check.
5636 			this.hasRetracted = false;
5637 			this.collectionNode.publishItem(item);
5638 		}
5639 		
5640 		this.lastMouseX = this.mouseX;	
5641 		this.lastMouseY = this.mouseY;
5642 		clearTimeout(this.pointTimer);
5643 		this.pointTimer = null;
5644 		this.pointTimer = setTimeout( bindUsingClosure(this.sendMyCursor,this), this.pollInterval);
5645 	}
5646 	
5647 }

5673 /**
5674  * @private
5675  */
5676 SharedCursorPane.prototype.moveCursorTo = function(p_userID, p_x, p_y)
5677 {
5678 	if (this.containsPoint(p_x,p_y)) {
5679 		var divElement = document.getElementById(p_userID);
5680 		divElement.style.position = "absolute";
5681 		var tweenX = new Tween(divElement, parseFloat(divElement.style.left) , p_x, 400);
5682 		var tweenY = new Tween(divElement, parseFloat(divElement.style.top) , p_y, 400);
5683 		tweenX.onTweenUpdate = this.onTweenUpdateX;
5684 		tweenY.onTweenUpdate = this.onTweenUpdateY;
5685 		//console.log("x " + divElement.style.left+" y " + divElement.style.top);
5686 		
5687 		if (p_x >= 0 && p_x <= document.body.clientWidth && p_y >= 0 && p_y <= document.body.clientHeight) {
5688 			this.setOpacity(divElement,1.0);
5689 		} else {
5690 			this.setOpacity(divElement,0.1);
5691 		}
5692 	}
5693 }

5695 /**
5696  * @private
5697  */
5698 SharedCursorPane.prototype.containsPoint = function(p_x,p_y)
5699 {
5700 	if(p_x >= this.x && p_x <= (this.x + document.body.clientWidth) && p_y >= this.y && p_y <= (this.y + document.body.clientHeight)) {
5701 		return true;
5702 	} else {
5703 		return false;
5704 	}
5705 }

5711 {

5713 	p_divElement.style.opacity = p_opacity;
5714 	p_divElement.style.filter = 'alpha(opacity = ' + (p_opacity * 100) + ')';
5715 }

5793 		this.collectionNode.retractItem(this.nodeName, this.userManager.myUserID);
5794 	}
5795 	//Remove mouse listener
5796 	if(!document.body.onmousemove) {
5797 		document.body.onmousemove = this.onMouseMove;
5798 	}
5799 	
5800 	if(this.pointTimer) {

5802 		this.pointTimer = null;
5803 	}

5806 /**
5807  * @private
5808  */
5809 SharedCursorPane.prototype.onMouseMove = function(p_evt)
5810 {
5811 	//reset the timer
5812 	clearTimeout ( this.cursorTarget.inactivityTimer );
5813 	if(p_evt == undefined) {
5814 		//this.cursorTarget.mouseX = window.event.clientX + this.scrollLeft - this.clientLeft;
5815 		//this.cursorTarget.mouseY = window.event.clientY + this.scrollTop - this.clientTop;
5816 		var doc = document.documentElement;
5817 		var body = document.body;
5818 		this.cursorTarget.mouseX = window.event.clientX + (doc && doc.scrollLeft || body && body.scrollLeft || 0) - (doc && doc.clientLeft || body && body.clientLeft || 0);
5819 		this.cursorTarget.mouseY = window.event.clientY + (doc && doc.scrollTop  || body && body.scrollTop  || 0) - (doc && doc.clientTop  || body && body.clientTop  || 0);
5820 	} else {
5821 		this.cursorTarget.mouseX = p_evt.pageX;
5822 		this.cursorTarget.mouseY = p_evt.pageY;
5823 	}
5824 	
5825 	if (!this.cursorTarget.pointTimer) {
5826 		this.cursorTarget.sendMyCursor();
5827 	}
5828 }

5836 	this.lastMouseX = this.lastMouseY = -1;
5837 }

5851 /**
5852  * @private
5853  * @ignore
5854  * @class Helper - Internal method to manage tweens
5855  * @constructor
5856  */
5857 function Tweener()
5858 {
5859 	
5860 }
5861 
5862 /**
5863  * @private
5864  * @ignore
5865  */
5866 Tweener.prototype.ActiveTweens = new Object();
5867 /**
5868  * @private
5869  */
5870 Tweener.prototype.Interval = 10;
5871 /**
5872  * @private
5873  * @ignore
5874  */
5875 Tweener.prototype.IntervalToken;
5876 /**
5877  * @private
5878  * @ignore
5879  */
5880 Tweener.prototype.TweenCount = 0;
5881 
5882 /**
5883  * @private
5884  * @ignore
5885  */
5886 Tweener.prototype.AddTween = function(tween)
5887 {
5888 	this.ActiveTweens[tween.ID] = tween;
5889 	if (this.IntervalToken==undefined) {
5890 		//this.Dispatcher.DispatchTweens = this.DispatchTweens;
5891 		this.IntervalToken = setInterval(bindUsingClosure(this.DispatchTweens,this) , this.Interval);
5892 	}
5893 }
5894 
5895 /**
5896  * @private
5897  * @ignore
5898  */
5899 Tweener.prototype.RemoveTween = function(tween)
5900 {
5901 	delete this.ActiveTweens[tween.ID];
5902 	var tweensLeft = false;
5903 	
5904 	for (var i in this.ActiveTweens) {
5905 		tweensLeft = true;
5906 		break;
5907 	}
5908 	
5909 	
5910 	if (!tweensLeft) {
5911 		clearInterval(this.IntervalToken);
5912 		delete this.IntervalToken;
5913 	}
5914 }
5915 
5916 /**
5917  * @private
5918  * @ignore
5919  */
5920 Tweener.prototype.DispatchTweens = function()
5921 {
5922 	var aT = this.ActiveTweens;
5923 	for (var i in aT) {
5924 		aT[i].doInterval();
5925 	}
5926 }
5927 
5928 /**
5929  * @private
5930  * @ignore
5931  */
5932 Tweener.initialize = function(object) {
5933 	object.tweener = _tweener;
5934 }
5935 /**
5936  * @private
5937  * @ignore
5938  */
5939 var _tweener = new Tweener();
5940 
5941 /**
5942  * @class The Tween class defines a tween, a property animation performed
5943  *  on a target object over a period of time.
5944  *  
5945  *  When the constructor is called, the animation automatically starts playing.
5946  *
5947  *  @param listener Object that is notified at each interval of the animation. You typically pass the <code>this</code> 
5948  *  keyword as the value.  The <code>listenerObj</code> must define the <code>onTweenUpdate()</code> method and optionally the  
5949  *  <code>onTweenEnd()</code> method. The former method is invoked for each interval of the animation,  and the latter is invoked just after the animation finishes.
5950  *  @param init Initial value(s) of the animation. Either a number or an array of numbers. If a number is passed, the Tween interpolates
5951  *  between this number and the number passed in the <code>endValue</code> parameter. If an array of numbers is passed, 
5952  *  each number in the array is interpolated.
5953  *  @param end Final value(s) of the animation. The type of this argument must match the <code>startValue</code>  parameter.
5954  *  @param dur Duration of the animation, expressed in milliseconds.
5955  *  @constructor
5956  */  
5957 function Tween(listenerObj, init, end, dur)
5958 {
5959 	if ( listenerObj==undefined ){
5960 		return;
5961 	}
5962 	
5963 	this.arrayMode = false;
5964 	
5965 	this.listener = listenerObj;
5966 	this.initVal = init;
5967 	this.endVal = end;
5968 	
5969 	Tweener.initialize(this);
5970 	
5971 	if (dur!=undefined) {
5972 		this.duration = dur;
5973 	}
5974 	this.ID = this.tweener.TweenCount++;
5975 	this.startTime = new Date().getTime();
5976 	
5977 	if (this.Interval) {
5978 		this.tweener.Interval = this.Interval;
5979 	}
5980 	
5981 	if (this.IntervalToken) {
5982 		this.tweener.IntervalToken = this.IntervalToken;
5983 	}
5984 	
5985 	if (this.TweenCount) {
5986 		this.tweener.TweenCount = this.TweenCount;
5987 	}
5988 	
5989 	if ( this.duration==0 ) {
5990 		this.doInterval()
5991 	} else {
5992 		this.tweener.AddTween(this);
5993 	}
5994 }
5995 
5996 //EventDispatcher.initialize(Tween.prototype);
5997 
5998 /**
5999  * Object that is notified at each interval of the animation.
6000  * @field
6001  */ 
6002 Tween.prototype.listener = undefined;
6003 /**
6004  * @private
6005  */
6006 Tween.prototype.tweener = undefined;
6007 /**
6008  * Duration of the animation, in millisecond's.
6009  *  @field
6010  */  
6011 Tween.prototype.duration = 3000;
6012 
6013 /**
6014  *  Initial value(s) of the animation. Either a number or an array of numbers. If a number is passed, the Tween interpolates
6015  *  between this number and the number passed in the <code>endValue</code> parameter. If an array of numbers is passed, 
6016  *  each number in the array is interpolated.
6017  *  @field
6018  */ 
6019 Tween.prototype.initVal = undefined; // relaxed type to accommodate numbers or arrays
6020 /**
6021  *  Final value of the animation.The type of this argument must match the startValue parameter.
6022  *  @field
6023  */  
6024 Tween.prototype.endVal = undefined;
6025 /**
6026  *  @private
6027  */
6028 Tween.prototype.arrayMode;
6029 /**
6030  *  @private
6031  */
6032 Tween.prototype.startTime;
6033 /**
6034  *  @private
6035  */
6036 Tween.prototype.updateFunc;
6037 /**
6038  *  @private
6039  */
6040 Tween.prototype.endFunc;
6041 /**
6042  *  @private
6043  */
6044 Tween.prototype.ID;
6045 
6046 /**
6047  * @private
6048  */
6049 Tween.prototype.doInterval = function()
6050 {
6051 	var curTime = new Date().getTime() -this.startTime;
6052 	var curVal= this.getCurVal(curTime);
6053 	
6054 	if (curTime >= this.duration) {
6055 		this.endTween();
6056 	} else {
6057 		if (this.updateFunc!=undefined) {
6058 			this.listener[updateFunc](curVal);
6059 		} else {
6060 			this.onTweenUpdate(curVal);
6061 		}
6062 	}
6063 }
6064 
6065 
6066 /**
6067  * @private
6068  */
6069 Tween.prototype.getCurVal = function(curTime)
6070 {
6071 	if (this.arrayMode) {
6072 		var returnArray = new Array();
6073 		for (var i=0; i<initVal.length; i++) {
6074 			returnArray[i] = this.easingEquation(curTime, this.initVal[i], this.endVal[i]-this.initVal[i], this.duration);
6075 		}
6076 		return returnArray;
6077 	}
6078 	else {
6079 		return this.easingEquation(curTime, this.initVal, this.endVal-this.initVal, this.duration);
6080 	}
6081 }
6082 
6083 /**
6084  *  Interrupt the tween, jump immediately to the end of the tween, 
6085  *  and invoke the <code>onTweenEnd()</code> callback function.
6086  *  @function
6087  */  
6088 Tween.prototype.endTween = function()
6089 {
6090 	if (this.endFunc!=undefined) {
6091 		this.listener[endFunc](endVal);
6092 	} else {
6093 		//this.listener.onTweenEnd(endVal);
6094 	}
6095 	this.tweener.RemoveTween(this);
6096 }
6097 
6098 /**
6099  *  Stops the tween, ending it without dispatching an event or calling
6100  *  the Tween's endFunction or <code>onTweenEnd()</code>.
6101  *  @function
6102  */  
6103 Tween.prototype.stopTween = function()
6104 {
6105 	this.tweener.RemoveTween(this);
6106 }
6107 
6108 /**
6109  * @private
6110  */
6111 Tween.prototype.setTweenHandlers = function(update, end)
6112 {
6113 	this.updateFunc = update;
6114 	this.endFunc = end;
6115 }
6116 
6117 /**
6118  * @private
6119  */
6120 Tween.prototype.easingEquation = function (t,b,c,d)
6121 {
6122 	return c/2 * ( Math.sin( Math.PI * (t/d-0.5) ) + 1 ) + b;
6123 }
